welcomePage.title: Welcome to the app!
welcomePage.description: This app offers more than just a collection of recipes - it is designed to be your very own digital cookbook. You can easily save and retrieve your own recipes at any time.

error.401: Wrong email or password. Try again!
error.409: A user with this email address or name is already registered. Please log in or enter a different email address

error.name: The name must contain only letters, spaces and dashes
error.email: Is not valid email. The email must be for example: email@example.com
error.password: Your password is weak. The password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number
